title: What do I do with my wrist to turn on my B1's screen?
answer:
Your B1 has unique motion operations. You can turn on your B1's screen as follows: 

 1. Wear your B1 on your wrist and raise your wrist levelly. 

 2. Rotate your wrist outwards for 90 degrees and turn it back. Then you can see the screen is on. 

 3. Rotate your wrist again to switch between screens. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=47359)
